sourcesContent: import{isDesignToken as t,cssNameTransform as r}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{isThemeStylePropKey as e}from"../types/theme.mjs";import{stylePropsToThemeKeys as n}from"./constants.mjs";const o=t=>"string"==typeof t&&t.length>0,i=t=>"function"==typeof t,s=t=>"string"==typeof t&&0===t.length,f=t=>null==t||s(t),p=(t,r)=>{const e=r-t+1;return Array.from({length:e},((r,e)=>e+t))},l=(t,r)=>r?`${t}--${r}`:"",m=(t,r,e)=>e?`${t}--${r}`:"",u=t=>Object.keys(t),y=(o,i,s)=>{if("string"!=typeof i)return i;if(i.includes(" "))return i.split(" ").map((t=>y(o,t,s))).join(" ");if(e(o)){const e=i.split("."),f=n[o];let p=s[f];for(let t=0;t<e.length&&p;t++)p=p[e[t]];return t(p)?`var(--${r({path:[n[o],...e]})})`:i}return i};export{l as classNameModifier,m as classNameModifierByFlag,y as getCSSVariableIfValueIsThemeKey,p as getConsecutiveIntArray,s as isEmptyString,i as isFunction,f as isNullOrEmptyString,u as objectKeys,o as strHasLength};
